directIntegration.title: DIRECT INTEGRATION
directIntegration.description: Easily connect our AI systems to your existing tools, making your workflows faster and more efficient.

skipRewatching.title: SKIP RE-WATCHING MATCHES
skipRewatching.description: Let our AI do the heavy lifting. No more re-watching matches or spending hours to find the right moments.

decreaseCosts.title: DECREASE COSTS
decreaseCosts.description: Save time and money by automating the process of finding tactical flaws in your game with just a few clicks.

trainWithData.title: TRAIN WITH DATA
trainWithData.description: Use data-driven insights to make smarter training decisions and improve performance based on match analysis.

increasePerformance.title: INCREASE PERFORMANCE
increasePerformance.description: Gain AI-driven training plans tailored to your needs and goals to optimise your strategy.

outplayCompetition.title: OUTPLAY COMPETITION
outplayCompetition.description: Not only will you learn from your mistakes, but also from your opponents'. With our insights, you can outplay the competition by identifying their weaknesses
